0.description:
If you need a specific measurement, manually change the formula by the measurement number. 

If you want to switch back from manual to automatic mode, copy and paste the formula below into the value field. 

Formula:
{paddings_desktop.set-the-base}/{paddings_desktop.set-the-scale}
